item.title: Project 1: KPMG Data Analytical Virtual Internship
item.description: KPMG Data Analytical Virtual Internship is an open access program designed to work with big data and learn the process in producing business results. It contains three modules: Module 1: Analysing potential data quality issues within business data. Module 2: Understanding potential data strategies behind data analysis. Module 3: Assessed data visualization skills. Customer Age Distribution Customer Job Distribution Customer Owns/No Car Total Customers by Purchases(bin) and Age(bin) over Past Three Years Profit by Brand and Month Profit by Brand and Month This Project’s GitHub Repository
